name: Balance Wiggler
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and perform the following according to the number of your opponent's rear-guards・Two or less ‐ This unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. ・Three or more ‐ Choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guard, and retire it.
flavor: Degeneration or prosperity. Which side shall the scales tip to tonight?

name: Flarestrike Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: You shall be the one to take on my flames.

name: Knight of War Damage, Fosado
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.[AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [Counter-Charge 1]/[Soul-Charge 1].
